original_text: Then you must chase out all the people who live in that land. You must destroy all their idols that are made from wood or stone. Also destroy the altars where they worship their false gods.
korean_text: 그 땅의 원주민을 너희 앞에서 다 몰아내고 그 새긴 석상과 부어 만든 우상을 다 깨뜨리며 산당을 다 헐고

sentences.original_text: Then you must chase out all the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 모든 사람들을 쫓아내야 한다

sentences.original_text: You must destroy all their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들의 모든 우상을 파괴해야 한다

sentences.original_text: that are made from wood or stone
where they worship their false gods
